description:
Spotsave is a location-based mobile app promoting local businesses near you. Our platform serves promotions from local small businesses including restaurants, grocery stores, health & beauty supplies, automotive repair and much more.

Spotsave Features:
Store Search: search by store name, city or state. Find discounts, promotions, coupons and deals nearby.

Category Search: Search by predefined categories, including: Food and Grocery, Babies and Children, Restaurant and Dining, Sports and Fitness, Automotive, Apparel, Arts and Crafts, Entertainment, Health and Beauty, Home and Garden, Travel and Transportation.

Location Based Search: App automatically displays search results based on users predefined location. Upon registering for app, user can select a predetermined location to display promotions. If a user moves out of their predetermined location, Spotsave will locate users location and display promotions nearby.

Save Promotions: Users can save promotions for future use. Expired promotions will not be displayed, so accurate and valid promotional codes will only be displayed.

Share Promotionss with Family and Friends via Twitter, Facebook and email.

Any suggestions and comments, please feel free to contact us.
